Sentencas: We report a substantial enhancement of the oxide-ion conductivity in Sr11Mo4O23 achieved by Nb doping the Mo sites.
Titulo: Structural origin of the enhanced ionic conductivity upon Nb doping in Sr11Mo4O23 defective double perovskite

Sentencas: This series responds to the formula: Sr11Mo4-xNbxO23-delta (with x = 0.0, 0.5 and 1.0).
Titulo: Structural origin of the enhanced ionic conductivity upon Nb doping in Sr11Mo4O23 defective double perovskite

Sentencas: The original structure can be related to the conventional double perovskite; however, it presents a broken corner sharing connectivity of the octahedral framework, hence leading to a complex and highly defective network.
Titulo: Structural origin of the enhanced ionic conductivity upon Nb doping in Sr11Mo4O23 defective double perovskite

Sentencas: The samples were prepared via citrate precursor method, followed by thermal treatments at 1300 degrees C for 12 hours in air.
Titulo: Structural origin of the enhanced ionic conductivity upon Nb doping in Sr11Mo4O23 defective double perovskite

Sentencas: The crystal structures were refined from X-ray and neutron powder diffraction (NPD) data.
Titulo: Structural origin of the enhanced ionic conductivity upon Nb doping in Sr11Mo4O23 defective double perovskite

Sentencas: A phase transition from tetragonal to cubic symmetry is identified in a temperature-dependent NPD study, driven by an oxygen delocalization effect.
Titulo: Structural origin of the enhanced ionic conductivity upon Nb doping in Sr11Mo4O23 defective double perovskite

Sentencas: The ionic conductivity measured by impedance spectroscopy is enhanced upon Nb-doping; the x = 1 doped phase exhibits a threefold increase compared to the pristine Sr11Mo4O23 oxide, with conductivity values of 7.6 x 10(-3) and 2.7 x 10(-2)
Titulo: Structural origin of the enhanced ionic conductivity upon Nb doping in Sr11Mo4O23 defective double perovskite

Titulo: Structural origin of the enhanced ionic conductivity upon Nb doping in Sr11Mo4O23 defective double perovskite
